connection.title: Kafka cluster connection
connection.description: List and manage all the Kafka Cluster connections available to the tools in the Integration Developer Hub.

kafka-configuration.title: Kafka cluster configuration
kafka-configuration.description: View and change all the configuration for a Kafka cluster.

kafka-insights.title: Kafka cluster insights
kafka-insights.description: Get insights about a Kafka cluster workload and set up rules to automatically rebalance the workload.

topic-manager.title: Kafka topics manager
topic-manager.description: List and delete topics for a Kafka cluster.

topic-creator.title: Create a Kafka topic
topic-creator.description: Create a new Kafka topic, set its properties.

message-browser.title: Message browser
message-browser.description: View the data being produced to a topic. Browse messages, seek to a specific offset or timestamp by partition.
